page.title: 19HOUSING
page.content: Brownhills House,St Andrews, which is an old Victorian Mansion set in extensive grounds, enjoys an enviable position approximately 1 mile South- East of St Andrews, and has commanding views over St Andrews Bay.The property has been extensively renovated and converted to form seven luxury self- contained flats,each with a garage.The flats are furnished to a very high standard,with luxury kitchens,coloured bathroom suites with showers and with full electric central heating,yet each flat retains many of the attractive features of the original house. All flats share a mature walled garden. This type of conversion is becoming common in the St Andrews locality with increasing demand for property with character.
